item.title: Comment on Banning Airbnb in NYC by extramsg
item.description:
NYC has 120,000 hotel rooms
It has 2,300,000 residential rental units
It had 40,000 short term rentals (airbnbs)

40,000 units is less than 2% of the rental market but a third of the hotel market. The loss of those units affecting hotel prices bigly while not doing anything for rents should surprise no one.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/09/banning-airbnb-in-nyc.html?commentID=160808720

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/09/banning-airbnb-in-nyc.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=banning-airbnb-in-nyc
